entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon.
